short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of tree spectrum every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom Tree Spectrum Background" is a browser extension that enhances your browsing experience with a beautifully designed background featuring a spectrum of trees. It includes an optimized search bar, customizable shortcuts, and displays current time and weather information, all seamlessly integrated into the background. Ideal for users who want a visually appealing and functional new tab page.
